segments.text: What kind of food do you serve ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We serve a great variety of popular Japanese dishes in set courses , and also many meat dishes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . That sounds fine . Until what time are you open ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We are open until 10 but our last order for dinner is at 9:30 pm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . Well be there before then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , sir . We look forward to welcoming you .
segments.speaker: S2
